name: @notify.me/link-parser
description: A directory of supported platforms for Notify with link parsing and metadata

scripts.push: yarn build; cp -R package.json README.md LICENSE yarn.lock dist; (cd dist && yarn publish --non-interactive); rm -rf dist/package.json dist/README.md dist/LICENSE dist/yarn.lock
scripts.lnk: yarn build; cp -R package.json README.md LICENSE yarn.lock dist; (cd dist && yarn link)

author: Notify Technology, Inc. <code@notify.me>
